title: Nation-state is territory with identity and state

content.question: A nation-state is best characterized as

choices.label: a subnational unit of government such as Chiapas or Tibet
a politically defined territory in which the state and national identity coincide
a sovereign state where the legislature is appointed rather than elected
the members of a regime holding power in a state
the national majority in a democratic election

content.answer: a politically defined territory in which the state and national identity coincide

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
